mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_feed_comment set ifeed = #{ifeed}, iuser = #{iuser}, comment = #{comment}
mapper.select: SELECT A.ifeed_comment AS ifeedComment, A.comment, A.created_at AS createdAt, B.iuser AS writerIuser, B.nm AS writerNm, B.pic AS writerPic from t_feed_comment AS A JOIN t_user AS B ON A.iuser = B.iuser where A.ifeed = #{ifeed} order by A.ifeed_comment LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{rowCount}
mapper.delete: delete from t_feed_comment where ifeed_Comment = #{ifeedComment} and iuser = #{iuser}
mapper.select: SELECT A.ifeed_comment AS ifeedComment, A.ifeed ,A.comment ,A.created_at AS createdAt ,B,iuser AS writerIuser ,B.nm AS writerNm ,B.pic AS writerPic FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY ifeed) rnum , ifeed, COMMENT, ifeed_comment, iuser, created_at FROM t_feed_comment WHERE ifeed IN(<foreach collection="list" item="comment" separator="" ) #{comment.ifeed} ))A INNER JOIN t_user as B ON A.iuser = B.iuser WHERE A.rnum <= 4
